titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The Archdeacon, Pemberton, and I met in my study, & discussed the Sherburn Constitution, in which it is proposed to make considerable changes. We agreed on a number of alterations.
During the afternoon there was a heavy thunderstorm, with a deluge of rain.
I spent half an hour in preparing Olive for Confirmation while the storm proceeded, & afterwards walked with Cruickshank on the Banks.
